Wonderful Indonesia Jadi Best Stand Feature di World Travel Mart London 2019
07 Nov 2019, 12:02 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Wonderful Indonesia Jadi Best Stand Feature di World Travel Mart London 2019

KBRN, Jakarta : November Wonderful Indonesia dinobatkan menjadi Best Stand Feature dalam bursa pariwisata bergengsi World Travel Mart (WTM) London 2019.Deputi Bidang Pengembangan Pemasaran II Kemenparekraf, Nia Niscaya mengatakan bahwa penghargaan Best Stand Feature baru pertama kali diberikan oleh penyelenggara WTM London."Event ini pertama kali dibuat oleh organizers WTM London. Award digelar dalam rangka hari jadi WTM London yang ke-40 tahun. Selama 40 tahun pelaksanaan WTM London, ini kali pertama ada pemberian awards terhadap penampilan booth atau pavilion," tutur Nia dalam keterangan resmi yang diterima RRI, Kamis (7/11/2019).Nia menjelaskan ada lima kategori awards yang diberikan dalam rangka ulang tahun ke-40 tahun WTM London. "Selain Best Feature Stand  yang kita menangkan, ada juga Best Stand Design, Best Stand for Doing Business, Best New Stand, dan Best Travel Technology Stand," kata Nia. Sementara Asdep Pengembangan Pemasaran II Regional IV Kemenparekraf Agustini Rahayu, menjelaskan, pavilion Indonesia menang karena beberapa penilaian. "Di antara beberapa penilaian yang kita terima. Seperti disain pavilion dengan menampilkan kapal phinisi sebagai focal point dipadukan dengan tekstur budaya dari 5 Destinasi Super Prioritas. Hal ini dianggap tim penilai sangat mencuri perhatian dibandingkan dengan stand lainnya. Promosi dan presentasi budaya kita juga unik. Mengangkat kerajinan lokal, pakaian etnik, dan lainnya," kata Ayu, panggilan akrabnya.Penilaian lainnya adalah stand Wonderful Indonesia mengusung budaya, sangat terbuka, dan mengajak pengunjung datang, serta membuka kesempatan kerja sama.

Wonderful Indonesia Becomes the Best Stand Feature at World Travel Mart London 2019
07 Nov 2019, 12:02 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Wonderful Indonesia Becomes the Best Stand Feature at World Travel Mart London 2019

KBRN, Jakarta: November Wonderful Indonesia has been named the Best Stand Feature in the prestigious London Travel World Mart (WTM) tourism exchange 2019. Deputy for Marketing Development II of the Ministry of Tourism and Culture, Nia Niscaya said that the Best Stand Feature award was given by London WTM organizers for the first time. " "This event was first made by WTM London organizers. The award was held in the framework of the 40th anniversary of WTM London. During the 40 years of WTM London, this was the first time there were awards given to the appearance of a booth or pavilion," said Nia in an official statement received by RRI, Thursday (7/11/2019). He explained that there were five award categories given in the context of London's 40th anniversary WTM. "In addition to the Best Feature Stand that we won, there is also the Best Stand Design, Best Stand for Doing Business, Best New Stand, and Best Travel Technology Stand," Nia said. While Deputy Assistant of Marketing Development II Regional IV Kemenparekraf Agustini Rahayu, explained, the Indonesian pavilion won because of several assessments. "Among the several evaluations we received. Like the design of the pavilion by displaying phinisi ships as focal points combined with the cultural texture of the 5 Super Priority Destinations. It is considered the assessment team is very stealing the attention compared to other stands. Our cultural promotions and presentations are also unique. "Lifting local handicrafts, ethnic clothing, and others," Ayu said, her nickname. Another assessment is that the Wonderful Indonesia stand carries culture, is very open, and invites visitors to come, and opens opportunities for cooperation.
